sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수 ', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPK', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_SEQ0', 4, 'SEQ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEMPK', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_KIND_CODE', 5, 'PCB 종류', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_SIZE_MIN0', 6, '제품 SIZE MIN(이상)', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '280', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_SIZE_MAX0', 7, '제품 SIZE MAX(미만)', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '280', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_PANL_CNT0', 8, 'PANEL 수량', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '160', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_PCNT_WIDE', 9, 'PANEL 수량_가로', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '220', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_PCNT_LENG', 10, 'PANEL 수량_세로', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '220', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_SIZE_WIDE', 11, 'PANEL SIZE_가로', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '260', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_SIZE_LENG', 12, 'PANEL SIZE_세로', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '260', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_COMP_A', 13, '계산상수_A', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_COMP_B', 14, '계산상수_B', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_COMP_C', 15, '계산상수_C', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_COMP_D', 16, '계산상수_D', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '120', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_CORR_COEF1', 17, '보정수량 계산상수_1', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '220', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_CORR_COEF2', 18, '보정수량 계산상수_2', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '220', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_APPL_GUBN', 19, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20180703', 'SYSTEM', '20180703', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_REMK', 20, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_UPDT_CMAN', 21, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_UPDT_DATE', 22, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_INIT_CMAN', 23, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBC', 'PCBC_INIT_DATE', 24, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:04:12', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBPCBC ( PCBC_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,PCBC_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PCBC_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,PCBC_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBC_KIND_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBC_SIZE_MIN0 VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBC_SIZE_MAX0 VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBC_PANL_CNT0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_PCNT_WIDE NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_PCNT_LENG NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_SIZE_WIDE NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_SIZE_LENG NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_COMP_A NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_COMP_B NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_COMP_C NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_COMP_D NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_CORR_COEF1 NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_CORR_COEF2 NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBC_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PCBC_REMK VARCHAR2(200) ,PCBC_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBC_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBC_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBC_INIT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBPCBC_PK PRIMARY KEY( PCBC_CORP_CODE ,PCBC_STND_GUBN ,PCBC_STND_DEGR ,PCBC_SEQ0 ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
